title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
mpire spawn until the end of his days.

If you did not face Cazador.

Astarion never faced Cazador, but events are moving too quickly to change that now. It's time to choose your destiny - Astarion's will have to wait.

All other outcomes:

We broke Astarion's cover and let the monster hunter capture him. That might be the last we see of the vampire spawn. Astarion's gone. One can't help but wonder if it had anything to do with us telling the monster hunter where we were camped. Astarion died. N
